content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good afternoon, Mr. Trabelsi. Thank you for coming to see our apartment. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your budget for renting a 25 square meter apartment in New York?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am a student. I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. My goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Therefore, I negotiate with a landlord at the apartment.

My budget is 1000 Euros per month.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest in renting our apartment, Mr. Trabelsi. We appreciate your willingness to be a responsible and dependable tenant. Based on your budget of 1000 Euros per month, we are willing to negotiate the rental price with you. What would you like to offer for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month.

Thank you for your understanding.

TERMINATE
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for accepting our offer of 900 Euros per month, Mr. Trabelsi. We appreciate your understanding and look forward to having you as our tenant. We will send you a rental agreement for your review and signature. Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns. Have a great day!
name: Heinrich Heine
